My name is Parveen and welcome to my abode.

Ever since I was a boy, I was a lover of stories. So much so that to this day I focus on it for my work and personal lives. I spend my days as a design leader who loves to bring a unique perspective to work everyday in the mecca of technology.

Now for a few stories about work that I have done:

  fireeye Bigger Needles, Smaller Haystacks
  apple Helping Those Who Help Others
  vudu Strategies For A Better Leisure Time
  paypal Build Collaboration
  rune Revenge of journalism
  walmart.com Relationships with Developers

I have more as well so you can review the full list of projects to get even more perspective on me.

Thanks for visiting! If you want to comment on anything or work together, I would love to hear from you!
